column1: Building Information Modelling Project Management Higher Level Apprenticeship (MSc)
column3: School of Natural and Built Environment
column5: This course is taught by a mixture of academic staff and industrial practitioners, bringing cutting edge research together with real world industry experience into the classroom.FUNDING / COMMITMENTThis Higher Level Apprenticeship (HLA) is fully funded by the DfE, although places are limited. Applicants and their employers must demonstrate commitment, and ensure enough time is allocated, to attend and complete the course.ABOUT YOUThe HLA is a work / study programme so you will already be in employment, or have a firm offer of employment from a company in the construction sector which supports your application.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
